str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: To flee out, away, escape; with an acc: I escape something. From ek and pheugo; to flee out.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To neglect, be careless of, disregard. To be careless of.
Or feminine telikaute from a compound of ho with helikos and houtos; such as this, i.e. (figurative) magnitude) so vast.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
From archomai; a commencement, or chief.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To confirm, ratify, secure, establish; pass: I guarantee. From bebaios; to stabilitate.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
